data.comment: Cycle relay task default name template.

data.name: CycleRelayMacroTask_Description
data.value: Cycle a relay. This changes the state of the relay off->on->off with a 200ms delay.
data.comment: Cycle relay task description.

data.name: CycleRelayMacroTask_InvalidRelay
data.value: Must be a value between 1 and {0}.
data.comment: Cycle relay task parameter error for invalid relay number.

data.name: CycleRelayMacroTask_InvalidRepeat
data.comment: Cycle relay task parameter error for invalid repeat value.

data.name: CycleRelayMacroTask_ToStringFormat
data.value: Cycle Relay {0}, repeat {1} times with a delay of {2} ms between repeats.
data.comment: Cycle relay task description template.

data.comment: Delay task default name template.

data.name: DelayTask_InvalidDelay
data.comment: Delay task parameter error for invalid delay.

data.name: DelayTask_ToStringFormat
data.comment: Dalay task description template.

data.name: SettingGroupName_DeviceConnection
data.comment: Title of the group containing settings for the device connection.

data.name: SettingGroupName_EyegazeInterface
data.comment: Title of the group containing settings for the eyegaze interface.

data.name: SettingGroupName_DwellClick
data.comment: Title of the group containing settings for the dwell click.

data.name: SettingGroupName_DwellTimes
data.comment: Title of the group containing settings for dwell times.

data.name: SettingDescription_DwellTimes
data.value: The dwell time settings specify the time that a control should be selected before it activates. Most controls will use the "Standard" time. However there are special controls that should have shorter or longer dwell times for safety or convenience. The "Stop" button for example should have a very short dwell time to help stop the chair in an emergency. The "Start" button should have a very long dwell time to prevent accidental activation.
data.comment: Description of the group of dwell time settings.

data.name: SettingName_AutoConnect
data.comment: Automatically connect to the device at application startup.

data.name: SettingGroupName_Camera
data.comment: Title of the group containing settings for the forward view camera.

data.name: SettingName_CameraEnabled
data.comment: Enable/disable the forward-view camera.

data.name: SettingName_CameraOverlayOpacity
data.comment: Sets the transparency of the driving view.

data.name: SettingDescription_CameraOverlayOpacity
data.value: Set the transparency of the driving buttons drawn over the forward-view camera image. Use 0 for fully transparent and 100 for fully opaque.
data.comment: Description of the camera overlay opacity setting.

data.name: SettingName_DwellClickEnabled
data.comment: Enable/disable dwell click.

data.name: SettingName_DwellClickRepeatDelay
data.comment: Time between dwell click repeats.

data.name: SettingName_DwellClickTime_Standard
data.comment: Time that the user must look at the target for the dwell click to "press" for most buttons and controls.

data.name: SettingName_DwellClickTime_DirectionButtons
data.comment: Time that the user must look at the target for the dwell click to "press" for the "direction" buttons on the driving view.

data.name: SettingName_DwellClickTime_StartButton
data.comment: Time that the user must look at the target for the dwell click to "press" for the "start" button on the driving view.

data.name: SettingName_DwellClickTime_StopButton
data.comment: Time that the user must look at the target for the dwell click to "press" for the "stop" button on the driving view.

data.name: SettingName_DwellClickTimeout
data.comment: The time after the users gaze leaves the target before it is reset.

data.name: StatusView_NudgeDuration
data.comment: The time that the nudge is applied to the current motion.

data.name: StatusView_NudgeSpeed
data.comment: The amount of nudge that is applied.

data.name: StatusView_SafetyBypassStatus
data.comment: Enable/disable the safety bypass that prevents consecutive clicks in the same direction.

data.name: StatusView_Seconds
data.comment: Seconds

data.name: StatusView_XCenter
data.comment: The center point for the x servo.

data.name: StatusView_XServo
data.comment: The curent direction applied to the x servo.

data.name: StatusView_YCenter
data.comment: The center point of the y servo.

data.name: StatusView_YServo
data.comment: The current direction applied to the y servo.

data.comment: The format of the servo position indicators.

data.comment: The speed indicator when a speed has not been selected.

data.comment: The speed indicator for 'fast' speed.

data.comment: The speed indicator for 'manic' speed.

data.comment: The speed indicator for 'slow' speed.

data.name: SettingGroupName_ProfileSelection
data.comment: Title of the group containing the list of profiles.

data.name: ViewName_ProfileConfig
data.comment: The name of the profile configuration view.

data.name: SettingGroupName_ProfileSettings
data.comment: Title of the group containing the selected profile settings.

data.name: SettingGroupName_ProfileSpeed_Settings
data.comment: Title of the group containing the selected profile speed settings.

data.name: SettingName_ProfileName
data.comment: The lable displayed next to the "Name" setting in the profile configuration view.

data.name: CommandText_AddProfileSpeed
data.comment: Add a driving profile speed.

data.name: CommandText_AddProfile
data.comment: Add a driving profile.

data.name: ProfileSpeed_Default
data.comment: The default name for a new profile speed.

data.name: SettingDescription_ProfileSpeed_Name
data.value: The name of the profile speed. This will be used to identify this speed to the user.
data.comment: The description text displayed in the profile speed configuration view for the "name" setting.

data.name: SettingDescription_ProfileSpeed_X
data.value: The X deflection when the right or left buttons are pressed.
data.comment: The description text displayed in the profile speed configuration view for the "x" setting.

data.name: SettingName_ProfileSpeed_X
data.comment: The label text displayed in the profie speed configuration view for the "x" setting.

data.name: SettingName_ProfileSpeed_Name
data.comment: The label text displayed in the profile speed configuration view for the "name" setting.

data.name: SettingDescripion_ProfileSpeed_Nudge
data.value: The X deflection when one of the nudge buttons are pressed while moving forward.
data.comment: The description text displayed in the profile speed configuration view for the "nudge" setting.

data.name: SettingDescripion_ProfileSpeed_XDiag
data.value: The left or right deflection when one of the diagonal buttons are pressed.
data.comment: The description text displayed in the profile speed configuration view for the "xDiag" setting.

data.name: SettingDescripion_ProfileSpeed_YBackwardDiag
data.value: The backward deflection when one of the forward diagonal buttons are pressed.
data.comment: The description text displayed in the profile speed configuration view for the "yBackwardDiag" setting.

data.name: SettingDescripion_ProfileSpeed_YForwardDiag
data.value: The forward deflection when one of the forward diagonal buttons are pressed.
data.comment: The description text displayed in the profile speed configuration view for the "yForwardDiag" setting.

data.name: SettingDescription_ProfileSpeed_Backward
data.value: The forward deflection when the backward button is presssed.
data.comment: The description text displayed in the profile speed configuration view for the "yBackward" setting.

data.name: SettingDescription_ProfileSpeed_Forward
data.value: The forward deflection when the forward button is presssed.
data.comment: The description text displayed in the profile speed configuration view for the "yForward" setting.

data.name: SettingName_ProfileSpeed_Backward
data.comment: The label text displayed in the profile speed configuration view for the "yBackward" setting.

data.name: SettingName_ProfileSpeed_Forward
data.comment: The label text displayed in the profile speed configuration view for the "yForward" setting.

data.name: SettingName_ProfileSpeed_Nudge
data.comment: The label text displayed in the profile speed configuration view for the "nudge" setting.

data.name: SettingName_ProfileSpeed_XDiag
data.comment: The label text displayed in the profile speed configuration view for the "xDiag" setting.

data.name: SettingName_ProfileSpeed_YBackwardDiag
data.comment: The label text displayed in the profile speed configuration view for the "yBackwardDiag" setting.

data.name: SettingName_ProfileSpeed_YForwardDiag
data.comment: The label text displayed in the profile speed configuration view for the "yForwardDiag" setting.

data.name: ProfileName_Drive
data.comment: The default name of a new profile.

data.name: DrivingView_DriveSpeeds
data.comment: The header text displayed on the drive page above the drive speed buttons.

data.name: DrivingView_ForwardBackDuration
data.comment: The header text displayed on the drive page above the forward/backward duration buttons.

data.name: DrivingView_LeftRightDuration
data.comment: The header text displayed on the drive page above the left/right duration buttons.

data.name: SettingGroupName_Mouse
data.comment: Title of the group containing settings for the mouse cursor appearance.

data.name: SettingName_HideMouse
data.comment: The label text displayed for the "Hide Mouse" setting.

data.name: SettingDescription_HideMouse
data.value: With this setting enabled, use the left "ctrl" key to toggle the mouse cursor visiblity.
data.comment: The text describing the "Hide Mouse" setting.

data.name: SettingGroupName_DriveView
data.comment: Title of the group containing settings for the drive view appearance.

data.name: SettingName_DriveViewTransparency
data.comment: The label text displayed for the "Camera Overlay Transparency" setting.

data.name: SettingDescription_DriveViewTransparency
data.value: Set the transparency of the direction buttons overlaying the forward view camera. Use "0" for transparent and "100" for fully opaque. This setting is only effective while the forward view camera is active.
data.comment: The label text displayed for the "Camera Overlay Transparency" setting.

data.name: SettingName_EyegazeInterface
data.comment: The label text displayed for the "Eyegaze System" setting.

data.name: SettingGroupName_Appearance
data.comment: Title of the group containing settings for the application appearance.

data.name: SettingName_ThemeColors
data.comment: The label text displayed for the theme "Colors" setting.

data.name: SettingName_ThemeImages
data.comment: The label text displayed for the theme "Images" setting.

data.name: SettingName_ThemeStyles
data.comment: The label text displayed for the theme "Styles" setting.

data.name: CommandText_Cancel
data.comment: Reset unsaved settings. changes

data.name: CommandText_Save
data.comment: Save all settings.

data.name: ViewName_CameraConfiguration
data.comment: The name of the camera configuration view.

data.name: ViewName_EyegazeConfig
data.comment: The name of the eyegaze configuration view.

data.name: SettingDescription_DeviceLimits
data.value: These settings control the maximum distance that the "Electronic Hand" will move measured in degrees from the center. Recomended maximum movement is 30 degrees in each direction. Be very careful not to exceed the physical limits of joystick hardware!
data.comment: The description of the "device limits" settings.

data.name: SettingDescription_DeviceTrim
data.value: Use this to set the center-point for the "Electronic Hand" measured in degrees. The center should be close to "0,0" and must be within the device limits specified above.
data.comment: The description of the "device trim" settings.
